meanings.sent1: Having a sunny day for our picnic would be preferable.
meanings.sent2: It is preferable to wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meanings.sent3: It would be preferable to have ice cream for breakfast every day!
meanings.sent4: The idea of a world without war is as preferable as a dream.
meanings.sent5: The taste of fresh fruit is preferable to any artificial flavor.

meanings.definition: Worthy of being chosen over something else.
meanings.sent1: A comfortable bed is always preferable for a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent2: In this case, a peaceful solution is preferable to a violent one.
meanings.sent3: It's preferable to have a pet rock than a pet snake in your pocket.
meanings.sent4: The path less traveled may be more difficult, but it is always preferable.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of accomplishment is preferable to any material possession.
